member.name: T:Common.Logging.EntLib.EntLibLogger
member.summary: Concrete implementation of interface specific to Enterprise Logging.
member.remarks: Default priority is used. The category name used is the name passed into LogManger.GetLogger
member.author: Mark Pollack

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Logs the specified message at the TraceEventType.Verbose level.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.EntLib.EntLibLogger.Trace(System.Object,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs the specified message and exception at the TraceEventType.Verbose level.

member.summary: Logs the specified message at the TraceEventType.Verbose level.
